author: Gary Brown
comment: Unable to change colors to the ones that I want. Cannot get steps on one of the indicators will not change. Not real happy with this one.  In response to the Developer, yes, I did try to change the colors via the app. Got it to work sometimes. The text colors are the ones giving me the problems. Making changes to  the watch is not very responsive. As for the "steps"....yes, I'm connected to FIT. I show the left indicator on the app but the watch still shows Watch and phone indications. For some reason it won't change.   If we can get this to work, I'll change my star rating. I do like this watch face.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you tried to change color on the watch settings? Please, connect to fit via companion app for steps.

author: Jim Thibault
comment: New Best, an Analog face with up to four external complications. This is my new favorite. I picked black active and ambient and it looks great. Was able to pick Ext heart rate, step counter, meeting, and weather no other watch face I found could do this. One minor fault the numbers if you pick them are ugly

author: Matthew Balestra
comment: Bought on my phone, then wanted me to buy again on my watch. Then kept declining payment (figured I could get a refund for one of the payments)... Says Huawei watch is compatible even... Can't even put on my phone!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please try to reinstall the app.

author: Richard Bickerton
comment: I would like this to be my go-to watch face. I like the style, the resolution, the customizability. However there is one thing I consider to be a major problem. When you choose to display the date it displays the day of the week and the full name of the month. It does not display the date.   followup:  If I use the right complication and not the top I can get a month date display. I would prefer it on top, but it is not enough of an issue to keep this from being my go to watch face.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what  complication type you use on the bottom? If you have a pill complication, then it covers the date. Try with simple (circle) complication onnthe bottom and you should see the  date in the right bottom of the screen. Just like on video and screenshots.

author: Jason Sherman
comment: The Arabic numerals look so bad. They are blocky and different colors. Take a look at the 6 in the image. So ugly I wouldn't want to use it.

author: Cory Wilson
comment: Didn't look as nice as I expected on my zen watch 2. Maybe if I had a round watch it might look better. Unfortunately missed the refund window. But still giving 4 stars because it's legit

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please send us the Order number and we will make refund for you. Tnx for the feedback.

author: Seza Tas
comment: In general it is nice except the hour/minute hands. They are ugly and don't fit with the rest. please provide an option for different hands or at least fix them. and please add white background.

author: Kai Tooie
comment: Will not install on my Huawei watch, even though the specs say it is compatible.  My watch works fine otherwise with all other faces.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, install the watch face from wear store on your watch!

author: Lisa Seifrid
comment: This is exactly the watch face I was looking for. It has the classic watch face, but still shows the date, steps, battery, and weather. Then you can click on them and obtain more details, i.e. weekly forecast, weekly activities. Love the color options as well. Very pleased with this app.

author: Art Leal
comment: Blurry, numbers jagged and not clean. Not elegant at all. Refund please

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Send transaction id on email for refund

author: Daron Latta
comment: Why doesn't the weather work? I may need a refund.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, check do you enable location permission. Also try to change a weather provider or reinstall the app.

author: Jim Propert
comment: Watch app is the best one I have used so far for my Sony 3, and it also squares to the watch square screen perfectly.

author: Colin Seftor
comment: Great watch face! I've been searching for one like it for a long time.

author: Tyrée Johnson
comment: Do not like the white ring dots around the watch face. Please add option to remove

author: Corey
comment: For some reason, every once and awhile, the color of the background and text change to random colors.

author: Carl Hauck
comment: Really like this face.  All colors work.  Phone interface for customization is simple and works. This is a keeper!

author: Waylander
comment: Would be 5 stars if it was brighter. I have to turn my brightness up to 5 for it to look right.
This is my favourite watch face, the blue face is as the name suggests, Elegant. Very classy.

author: tom ballein
comment: Lots of options easy to use very customizable classy looking
Has all the info I need in  an attractive format.

author: Michael Watkins
comment: Good looking and thus far has worked as stated.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, what kind of watch you have?

author: Craig Ogier
comment: Excellent. My current daily driver

author: Hernan Jr
comment: Absolutely gorgeous

author: Derek Brugman
comment: Ok I up my rating yo 4 stars.  Turns out the reason complications we're not updating was the cleaner app I had installed.  Removing that fix the problem.  It works great now.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you connected to the Google Fit via companion app?update: tnx for the feedback

author: Kelly Griffin
comment: Love the watch face and options. However, weather will not update unless you RESET the settings. Even then, the temperature on watch face doesn't update.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, if you selected openweathermap provider we have experienced server down from the privider. So, that's why you didn't have updated weather data. Now it should work ok.

author: Andrey Fomchenko
comment: RichFace team has responded promptly and fixed complication issue within two hours, thank you guys. But digit rendering is still awful, I can't believe this font distortion was meant by design.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, could you please send us screenshot or better video? We mostly tested on the moto 360 2nd gen. For weather provider try to switch to other provider.

author: Dave Lufkin
comment: Really fantastic watch face. Two things I love: square on square watches, and has a setting toggle to allow for changing colors separately from the other touch functions. Keep up the great work!

author: Paul Mills
comment: Would get a 5, except when select watch and phone battery in same position, it won't show either. Otherwise, it is very elegant.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi Paul, try a new version.Update: Any news after update?

author: Matthew Raupp
comment: I purchased and downloaded on my phone but after several attempts over a 12 hour period, the app won't download to my watch.  Junk, I want a refund!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Wear 2.0 version need to be downloaded from watch. Any feedback?

author: Davor Stojanovic
comment: Works great! Have everything I need.

author: Coder Online
comment: Very simple and clean design. Good work.
